 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/DyXrCK5wxUZEBDDhGulh5Xjpy?domain=e-eu.customeriomail.com> 
 

Hello Hagop

As the blessed days of Eid approach, all of us at Talktime extend our warmest wishes to you and your loved ones.

 

Eid is a time for reflection, gratitude, and connection — values that resonate deeply with our mission of supporting wellbeing and compassion. May this Eid bring you peace, joy, and countless blessings.

 

We are grateful for the trust and partnership you’ve placed in us, and we look forward to continuing this journey together, fostering hope and healing every step of the way.

 

Eid Mubarak — wishing you a holiday filled with happiness and beautiful moments.

With heartfelt regards,
The Talktime Team


 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/DyXrCK5wxUZEBDDhGulh5Xjpy?domain=e-eu.customeriomail.com>
